name: OfficeLife: DevBuild4
description:
OfficeLife will become a simulator about the decisions you make for yourself and for your business. Currently we are working on the basic office that you will start in. You can walk around in the office but there is nothing to do. After the office is complete we will add the currency system and software creating system.

We will keep you updated as time goes on!

Current Version: DevBuild4
